scripts.update-config: cp -r config client/ && cp -r config server/
scripts.dev: yarn update-config && concurrently --kill-others "yarn --cwd client serve" "yarn --cwd server dev"
scripts.deploy-server: yarn update-config && git branch -D prod-server && git subtree split --prefix server -b prod-server && git checkout prod-server && git mv .gitignore-deploy .gitignore && mv server/config config && git add . && git commit -a -m "Deploy" && git push -f heroku prod-server:main && git checkout main
